column4: Hi... is there anyway to completly undo any apt-get activity from today?
A lot unfortunatly... tried to install Mythtv...
Ok... think i'm going to have to uninstall Ubuntu (again :( )
Takes ages to reinstall, not looking forward to it
While i'm here, how can I stop my laptop running fsck when on battery?
Because installing MythTv has screwed quite a lot of stuff up
Not having much luck with Ubuntu lately :(
It installed quite a lot of other stuff, e.g. mysql...
uninstall everything like I just showed you
Trouble is I dont know exacttly what it installed, so cant get everything
Yep, its way too tricky to do that for this... soundray
- it doesnt show mysql when i run it, so its missed at least one
Long winded maybe... theres quite a lot
its your decision . you wont learnm anything at all by reinstalling everytime you have an issue
